Posts.Content: SHILO wrote: i had a hysterectomy 5 years ago ,,i am 36,, have 1 hild,,i have had 3 mamo's in the last 6 months,,the reason i have had 3 is due to the doctor seem to can not be able to read them,,omg i am having an mri in a few days,,the question i have is this,,they said i have really dense breast tissue,,i also i 3 lumps in 1 breast and 1 in the other,,out of all the mamos i have had,,they do show that the lumps have changed,,i am unsure of what to do,,i have a 14 year old daughter,,who does not have a father and i have no other family and i dont need to have something happen to me and have no 1 for my daughter,,i was wondering if any1 has been though this and tell me how there's ended up being,,i am so scared now and dont know what to do Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: very scared please help SHILO dlb823
